title: Himi 457
lyrics:
8.8.8.8.8.8
1.
‘Oku ou tui he ‘Otua,
Ne fakatupu ‘a e fonua,
Langi mo hono me’a kotoa:
He Tamai Māfimafi ia,
‘Ana ‘a e lāngilangi’ia,
Taupotu ‘i he ‘Afion
a
.
2.
Sīsū Kalaisi hono Ua,
He ‘Alo taha he ‘Otua,
‘Eiki ‘o Hēvani mo Lal
o
.
Ne tupu ‘i he Laumālie
‘Alo’i pe ‘e he Ta’ahin
e
Feia ‘ia Pailato.
3.
Kalusefai ‘a hono sino,
Pekia ia mo Teli
o
,
Hā’ele hifo ki Hētes
i
.
Ne hoko hono ‘aho tol
u
,
Pea hake leva mei Pulot
u
,
‘O hā mo’ui pē ‘i hen
i
.
4.
Pea ne toki ha’elea
Hala ki Langi Ta’etāea,
‘Afio ‘i he Kolōlia.
Ka te ne toe hifo mai
Ke fakamaau ‘a mamani,
‘A e kau mo’ui, mo
e
pekia.
5.
‘O u matu’aki tui at
u
He Laumālie Toputap
u
;
‘A e Siasi Tapu pe mo Tah
a
‘A e Fakamolemole hia;
‘A e Toetu’u ‘a e Sino ia;
Mo e Mo’ui Ta’engat
a
.
‘Emeni  *
